strengths: Clear and descriptive field names in English (username, profile_picture_url, followers_count)
Proper use of camelCase for properties
Proper use of PascalCase for class and enum names (InstagramProfileDto, AccountType)
Class has 80 lines - well within the 300 line limit
No methods - pure DTO, appropriate size and complexity
All validation decorators properly applied
Proper use of @IsOptional() for optional fields
Custom error messages on URL validators for better UX
Runtime validation enabled through class-validator decorators
@IsUrl() validator prevents malformed URLs
@IsString() prevents type confusion attacks
@IsNumber() ensures numeric fields are properly typed
@IsBoolean() ensures boolean fields are properly typed
@IsEnum() restricts account_type to valid values only
No hardcoded secrets or sensitive data
No SQL queries - pure DTO
No external API calls - pure DTO

violations.description: AccountType enum is not exported, making it unavailable for reuse
violations.recommendation: Consider exporting enum if it needs to be used elsewhere: 'export enum AccountType'

strengths: Proper file location: src/modules/instagram/dto/
Proper file naming: kebab-case (instagram-profile.dto.ts)
Follows NestJS DTO pattern with class-validator decorators
Follows Single Responsibility Principle - only defines data structure
Proper use of TypeScript definite assignment assertion (!) for required fields
Consistent decorator ordering: @ApiProperty then @Is* validators
Good separation of concerns - no business logic in DTO

missing: No JSDoc comments on class or enum (not critical for DTOs)
Enum values could have descriptions in @ApiProperty
strengths: All fields have @ApiProperty decorators with descriptions
Descriptions are clear and concise
Required vs optional properly documented in Swagger
Enum values properly documented in @ApiProperty
Field names are self-documenting

linterResults.notes: No linting errors or warnings in instagram-profile.dto.ts. Pre-existing warnings in other files are unrelated to TASK-006.

testCoverage.reason: DTOs in this project pattern do not have dedicated unit tests. Validation is verified through runtime usage and build verification.

review.codeCoverage: not_applicable - DTOs do not have unit tests

http.reason: TASK-006 is a DTO modification, not an HTTP endpoint

sql.reason: TASK-006 is a DTO modification, no database queries

logging.reason: TASK-006 is a DTO modification, no logging implementation

recommendations.description: Consider exporting AccountType enum for reuse in other files
